DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator to signify whether or not the patient completed one or more courses of neoadjvant therapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Treatment designed to be used as a first step toward shrinking the cancer and in evaluating response to drugs and other agents. Induction therapy is followed by additional therapy to eliminate whatever cancer remains._A period of protocol-prescribed activity or intervention._To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Treatment designed to be used as a first step toward shrinking the cancer and in evaluating response to drugs and other agents. Induction therapy is followed by additional therapy to eliminate whatever cancer remains.

Concepts.definition: Therapy administered prior to the primary treatment for the purpose of making the primary treatment more effective.

Property.preferredDefinition: A period of protocol-prescribed activity or intervention.:To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.

Concepts.definition: Passage through time; duration; a systematic or/and orderly succession; a sequence, e.g. course of treatment; a mode of action or behavior; natural development, typical manner of proceeding.
To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Released for TCGA per approval by T.Lichtenberg. mc 4/13/12

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator of Yes, No, or Unknown to represent a condition.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated to add NCIt concept relationship. Updated VM Short Name to be the Public ID to be consistent with current convention for VM Short Name - DW 10-03-2022
ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Did the patient complete one
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient complete one or more induction courses?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient complete all induction therapy during this reporting period?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was this the final course of induction that the patient will receive?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 01
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient complete high-risk Induction therapy (a minimum of 4 cycles and maximum of 6 cycles of chemotherapy)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient  receive a minimum of 3 cycles, and up to a maximum of 6 cycles of induction treatment within 20 weeks from cycle 1, day 1 of induction treatment.

DataElement.changeDescription: Released for TCGA per approval by T.Lichtenberg. mc 4/13/12
